code: @Override public void performDuringNoSnapshot(IndexMetaData indexMetaData, ClusterState currentState, Listener listener) {     getClient().admin().indices().execute(TransportFreezeIndexAction.FreezeIndexAction.INSTANCE, new TransportFreezeIndexAction.FreezeRequest(indexMetaData.getIndex().getName()), ActionListener.wrap(response -> listener.onResponse(true), listener::onFailure)). }
